sectionText: Topic: Slavic Graduate Study Professionalization Workshop. This course is designed for M.A. and Ph.D. graduate students in the Department of Slavic Languages and Literatures. The courseï¿½s objective is to introduce graduate students to the professional field of Slavic studies, enhancing their understanding of its opportunities and challenges.  We will work in particular on preparing conference presentations and articles for publication; book reviews; and grant applications.
